featured.text: It was not until 1800, when the White House was nearly completed, that its first residents, President John Adams and his wife Abigail, moved in.
Who initiated the construction of the White House? (A) John Adams.

definition.zh_def: 亞當斯，通常指一個姓氏或特定的個人名，特別是在歷史或政治背景中。
definition.en_def: Adams, typically a surname or a specific personal name, especially in historical or political contexts.
definition.example: John Adams was the second President of the United States.
